items.question: How are students tracked?
items.answer: Each partner gets a unique tracking link and shared spreadsheet. When a student registers through your link, they are automatically linked to your name. You can track each student's status with full transparency.

items.question: When are commissions paid?
items.answer: Commissions are paid 20 days after the student's payment date. The 20-day period is necessary to protect both parties from cancellations or refunds.

items.question: Why the 20-day period?
items.answer: This period protects both the partner and the company. If a student changes their mind or requests a refund during this period, the partner is not affected. After the period ends, the commission is transferred directly.

items.question: What data can I see?
items.answer: You can see: names of students registered through your link, each student's status (qualified, unqualified, contacted, in progress, paid, transferred), and registration date.

items.question: How do you ensure transparency?
items.answer: We provide a read-only shared spreadsheet that is continuously updated. At the end of each month, the spreadsheet is closed and a new one is opened. All previous data remains visible.

items.question: Are there costs to join?
items.answer: There are no costs at all. Joining is completely free and we provide you with all the support to get started.

items.question: Can I choose my own content style?
items.answer: Yes, you have complete freedom to choose your style, platform, and promotion method. We provide you with the information and materials, and you choose how to present them to your audience.

steps.title: Register for the Program
steps.description: Sign up for the partnership program. After approval, you get a personalized page.

steps.title: Your Personal Page
steps.description: You get a unique page, a custom registration form, and a tracking link you can share on Instagram stories, Linktree, highlights, or bio.

steps.title: Content Freedom
steps.description: Choose your style, method, and the platform that suits you. Create promotional content freely to match your audience.

steps.title: Student Registration
steps.description: Students click your special link and fill out the form. Each student is automatically linked to your name.

steps.title: Data Transparency
steps.description: A shared spreadsheet is created for each partner. You can see student names, their status, and progress. The spreadsheet is read-only — transparent and reliable.

steps.title: Track Student Status
steps.description: Each student is categorized: qualified, unqualified, contacted, in progress, paid, transferred.

steps.title: Monthly Cycle
steps.description: At the end of each month, the spreadsheet is closed and a new one opens for the next month. All data remains visible for history and transparency.

steps.title: Commission & Payment
steps.description: Commission is paid 20 days after student payment. The 20-day period is mandatory to protect against cancellations or refunds. This rule is clear and binding.
